/* Autogenerated UnityEngine.Text replacer code for {0} field */
private TextToTextMeshProAdapter {0}Adapter;
//[SerializeField] private TextMeshProUGUI {0}TMPro;
public TextMeshProUGUI {0}TMPro;
public Text {0}
{
    get
    {
        if ({0}Adapter == null)
        {
            {0}Adapter = new TextToTextMeshProAdapter({0}TMPro);
        }
        return {0}Adapter as Text;
    }
}
/* fin */
